structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.catch_line: Population, how determined -- Effect of change of population during term of officer.
law.text: The population of a county shall, for the purposes of KRS 64.346, be determined by the most recent federal decennial census enumeration; provided; however that the provisions of those sections and subsections shall not become operative to such officers mentioned therein during their term in counties determined to have acquired, since the last census, a population of more than 75,000.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 610, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 25, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 196, sec. 7.
